statements: SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT activity_id, description, activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities;

SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_description FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Fraud';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS total_activities FROM fraudulent_activities GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(activity_id) AS latest_activity_id FROM fraudulent_activities GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_description FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Fraud' ORDER BY activity_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM fraudulent_activities GROUP BY user_id, activity_type;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_description FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_id IN (SELECT MAX(activity_id) FROM fraudulent_activities GROUP BY user_id);
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE user_id = 200;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM suspicious_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_amount FROM suspicious_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, transaction_date FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE DATE(transaction_date) = '2022-01-20';
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM fraudulent_activities);
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM suspicious_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM suspicious_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_details FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 2000 AND user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM fraudulent_activities);
SELECT user_id, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM suspicious_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities JOIN users ON fraudulent_activities.activity_id = users.user_id

SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities JOIN suspicious_transactions ON fraudulent_activities.transaction_id = suspicious_transactions.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities JOIN user_accounts ON fraudulent_activities.user_id = user_accounts.user_id;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions JOIN user_accounts ON suspicious_transactions.transaction_id = user_accounts.user_id;

SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT user_id, username, email, transaction_amount FROM user_accounts LEFT JOIN suspicious_transactions ON user_accounts.user_id = suspicious_transactions.transaction_id
SELECT user_id, username, email, log_date FROM user_accounts RIGHT JOIN transaction_logs ON user_accounts.user_id = transaction_logs.transaction_id

SELECT user_id, username, email, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM user_accounts LEFT JOIN suspicious_transactions ON user_accounts.user_id = suspicious_transactions.transaction_id WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT user_id, username, email, log_id, log_description FROM user_accounts RIGHT JOIN transaction_logs ON user_accounts.user_id = transaction_logs.transaction_id WHERE log_id IS NOT NULL

SELECT user_id, username, email, log_id, log_description, log_date FROM user_accounts RIGHT JOIN transaction_logs ON user_accounts.user_id = transaction_logs.transaction_id WHERE log_date > '2022-01-01'

SELECT transaction_id, activity_description, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM fraudulent_activities INNER JOIN suspicious_transactions ON fraudulent_activities.transaction_id = suspicious_transactions.transaction_id

SELECT user_accounts.user_id, username, email, log_id, log_description, log_date FROM user_accounts RIGHT JOIN transaction_logs ON user_accounts.user_id = transaction_logs.transaction_id WHERE user_accounts.username LIKE '%admin%'

SELECT transaction_id, activity_description, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM fraudulent_activities INNER JOIN suspicious_transactions ON fraudulent_activities.transaction_id = suspicious_transactions.transaction_id WHERE transaction_amount > 500

SELECT user_id, username, email, log_id, log_description, log_date FROM user_accounts RIGHT JOIN transaction_logs ON user_accounts.user_id = transaction_logs.transaction_id WHERE log_description LIKE '%error%'
